name: Team Task Scheduler
short_description:
This project is a personal project. And is at the moment under no license. (Freely Available, no restrictions)

Goal of this project is to create a Program that helps organize a schedule for a small team. As case study I used a engineering departement with 3 engineers, that receive Projects with a rough estimation of time available for them to work on it. 

As mentioned above it is going to be a very specific application and cannot necessarily be used by everyone.

Base code is in C++ and I will try to utilize GTK+ for the GUI handling/design.
